title: Honours Programme Science
additional: Currently participating in the Honours Programme Science, which is a special program for student (who are doing a bachelor degree that is part of the science department). This program covers present-day topics of all types of sciences that are part of the science department. As part of this programme I get lectures from professors (of various fields) about the topics they are currently doing research about. I also followed research groups of our university (my case IDLab: one of the biggest research groups in belgium for computer science and TQC: Theory of quantum systems and complex systems).

title: Topics in Computer Science: Web Application Development (CS 391)
additional: During the summer of 2024 I take a course at Boston University. In this course I learn more about web development
